Uses of Package
de.nec.nle.siafu.exceptions

  • Packages that use de.nec.nle.siafu.exceptions 
    Package Description
    de.nec.nle.siafu.control
    With the exepction of the GUI class, this package contains all the controlling classes.
    de.nec.nle.siafu.exceptions
    This package contains all the simulation exceptions
    de.nec.nle.siafu.externalCommand
    Classes in this package provide the TCP based interface to control the simulator.
    de.nec.nle.siafu.model
    This package roughly contains all the modelled data objects.
  • Classes in de.nec.nle.siafu.exceptions used by de.nec.nle.siafu.control 
    Class and Description
    GUINotReadyException
    This exception is thrown when a component tries to issue a command to the GUI, but the GUI has not finished loading a simulation.
  • Classes in de.nec.nle.siafu.exceptions used by de.nec.nle.siafu.exceptions 
    Class and Description
    PlaceNotFoundException
    This exception is thrown when a place is searched by name, and not found.
    PositionUnreachableException
    This exception is thrown when pointing the agent to a valid position which the agent can not reach, because there is no path that leads to it.

    Exception thrown when an agent or place (i.e.

    Class and Description

    UnknownContextException
    This exception is thrown when retrieving a context variable which does not exist.
  • Classes in de.nec.nle.siafu.exceptions used by de.nec.nle.siafu.model 
    Class and Description
    AgentNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when an agent that is being searched by name, can not be found.
    GUINotReadyException
    This exception is thrown when a component tries to issue a command to the GUI, but the GUI has not finished loading a simulation.
    NothingNearException
    Exception thrown to indicate that there is nothing near the position that has been searched.
    PlaceNotFoundException
    This exception is thrown when a place is searched by name, and not found.
    PlaceTypeUndefinedException
    This exception is thrown when requesting places of a type that does not exist.
    PositionOnAWallException
    This exception is thrown when attempting to move the agent on a wall.
    PositionOutOfTheMapException
    This exception is thrown when attempting to create a position that is outside the map area.
    PositionUnreachableException
    This exception is thrown when pointing the agent to a valid position which the agent can not reach, because there is no path that leads to it.
    UnknownContextException
    This exception is thrown when retrieving a context variable which does not exist.
